Pero todo se ve opacado por los que utilizan cheat , es como si a valve no le interesara , las denuncias no se ven reflejadas , ya que un jugador requiere mas de 15 denuncias diarias para que aparezca en el overwatch , los puntos perdidos por partidas chiteadas no son devueltos , es decir que si jugaste 5 partidas y las 5 jugaste con jugadores con trampas bajaste de rango.

It's now free so definitely pick it up. Skill-based shooter with various game modes and an ELO-based ranked system plus a general level up system alongside. 

Pros: graphics are adept, each gun has a different spray pattern so weapon mastery actually exists in this (unlike in battlefield/CoD where weapon mastery is simply levelling up on a gun), competitive game modes require team strategy and challenges players.

Cons: I rank it just below League of Legends as one of the more unforgiving communities for new/casual players so be prepared for that. Game is also near-purely multiplayer so no single player campaign, however the online is engaging enough to counteract this. 

Even at its ¬£12 price tag before I'd recommend the purchase, for free I'd recommend picking this up regardless.
